>

</title>

<traits>

<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 51</row>

**Price** 5 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held, 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Three Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Many calignis use a debilitating poison crafted from subterranean fungi.

**Saving Throw** DC 16 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round); **Stage 2** As stage 1; **Stage 3** 1d6 poison, and [enfeebled 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round)
